lines.text: Tell that bitch who sent you how sorry I am I can no longer be her friend
Listen my son, TRUST NO ONE! You can count on no one but YOURSELF. Improve your skills, son, harden your body, become a NUMBER ONE MAN! Do not ever let ANYONE beat you!

[after punching Junjou in the back]
Soon you'll be unconscious through lack of oxygen; it's an ancient technique.
